messages.subject: I would like to introduce myselfe
messages.msgSnippet: My name is Patrick and I just want to say that im truly glad that i found a group on samurai history because i have studied the samurai from age 7 till now, I
messages.messageBody:
My name is Patrick and I just want to say that im truly glad that i
found a group on samurai history because i have studied the samurai
from age 7 till now, I just havn't been able to discuss my intrest
with anyone who understands. So i just want to say thanks for making
me feel welcome. Also, gongrads on the way you kept this group
orginized, im very impressed.
